Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.messages.server.gamestart

Class ShowTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.messages.server.ServerMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.messages.server.gamestart.ShowTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShowTable extends ServerMessage
This class represents a server message that shows the table state to the client. It is called when the game is starting, and the table state is updated. It extends the `ServerMessage` class and overrides the `callController` method to handle the table state. The `callController` method is used to update the client's view of the table state.
See Also:

    • callController

      public void callController(Controller controller)
      This method is used to invoke the `cardsOnTable` method on the provided controller. It is called when the `ShowTable` message is received by the client. The method is overridden from the `ServerMessage` class.
      Specified by:
      callController in class ServerMessage
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller on which the `cardsOnTable` method will be invoked.
